TestCase.name: testMultiSinksOnSameQueryOperationCatalogViewTable[0]
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[+($1, 2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[d, sum]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(c=[CONCAT($2, _UTF-16LE'test')], b=[+($1, 2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], changelogMode=[I], reuse_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b], changelogMode=[NONE]) +- Calc(select=[a, +(b, 2) AS b], changelogMode=[I]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[d, sum], changelogMode=[NONE]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, SUM(b) AS EXPR$1], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]], changelogMode=[I]) +- Calc(select=[CONCAT(c, _UTF-16LE'test') AS c, +(b, 2) AS b], changelogMode=[I]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinksOnSameQueryOperationCatalogViewTable[1]
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[+($1, 2)], c=[CONCAT($2, _UTF-16LE'test')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[d, sum]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$2], b=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[+($1, 2)], c=[CONCAT($2, _UTF-16LE'test')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, +(b, 2) AS b, CONCAT(c, _UTF-16LE'test') AS c], changelogMode=[I], reuse_id=[1]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], changelogMode=[I])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b], changelogMode=[NONE]) +- Calc(select=[a, b], changelogMode=[I]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[d, sum], changelogMode=[NONE]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, SUM(b) AS EXPR$1], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]], changelogMode=[I]) +- Calc(select=[c, b], changelogMode=[I]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinksOnSameSqlCatalogViewTable[0]
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[+($1, 2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[d, sum]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(c=[CONCAT($2, _UTF-16LE'test')], b=[+($1, 2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], changelogMode=[I], reuse_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b], changelogMode=[NONE]) +- Calc(select=[a, +(b, 2) AS b], changelogMode=[I]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[d, sum], changelogMode=[NONE]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, SUM(b) AS EXPR$1], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]], changelogMode=[I]) +- Calc(select=[CONCAT(c, _UTF-16LE'test') AS c, +(b, 2) AS b], changelogMode=[I]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinksOnSameSqlCatalogViewTable[1]
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[+($1, 2)], c=[CONCAT($2, _UTF-16LE'test')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[d, sum]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$2], b=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[+($1, 2)], c=[CONCAT($2, _UTF-16LE'test')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, +(b, 2) AS b, CONCAT(c, _UTF-16LE'test') AS c], changelogMode=[I], reuse_id=[1]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], changelogMode=[I])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b], changelogMode=[NONE]) +- Calc(select=[a, b], changelogMode=[I]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[d, sum], changelogMode=[NONE]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, SUM(b) AS EXPR$1], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]], changelogMode=[I]) +- Calc(select=[c, b], changelogMode=[I]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
